pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Meilisearch Python Async:warning:This project has been renamed to [meilisearch-python-sdk](https://github.com/sanders41/meilisearch-python-sdk):warning:Under the new name both an async and a sync client are provided. You should install the new packageinstead of this one.## Installation```shpip install meilisearch-python-sdk```
